thread.title: Plex is on its way to Apple TV
thread.title_full: Plex is on its way to Apple TV - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Plex is on its way to Apple TV
text:
Apple TV might have just won itself a few more fans. Plex, the popular service for organizing and streaming your personal movie and music collection, is finally coming to Apple's home theater device.
Co-founder Scott Olechowski confirmed as much to IT World this week following Apple's announcement that it's opening up the platform to third-party apps with its latest model Apple TV. In a statement, the co-founder said, "We are very excited to have a crack at bringing our users Apple TV." He added, "It’s been a long requested platform and we’re excited to work on it. We want it, our users want it … and we’re anxiously awaiting the tvOS developer beta info, so we can finally dig in." Olechowski also notes that he doesn't expect any... »
